statements: UPDATE support_tickets SET ticket_status = 'Resolved', ticket_resolved_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE ticket_id = 101

UPDATE customer_support_tickets SET ticket_status = 'Resolved' WHERE ticket_id = 101

SET resolved = TRUE,
customer_id = 202
WHERE query_id = 301;
